description: Episode 2: Bella once told me that nothing makes her more terrified than electricity. Just the thought of it makes her muscles quiver in fear. That inspired me to show her how electrosex can REALLY can make you muscles quiver, uncontrollably, without her command. Once I have the beautiful and all natural Bella Rossi wired up to the EMS unit, Mistress Ashley Fires is drooling at the mouth and cunt to get her hands all over Bella's curvacious body.
title: Bella Rossi is Back for More Electrosex!
